item.title: Rubble dumped into the road, 28th February
item.description:
55 Plough Way is dumping rubble into the road taking up 3 car spaced. My car was parked here this morning where I usually park. When I went to move the car, I reversed over a nail and have just spent Â£195 for a new tyre. I went to speak to those doing the work and they seemed not to speak English and would not tell me who they work for. They constantly put their bins in the road to block these spaces.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Plough Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two wooden bollards dislodged and lying on grass verge, 28th February
item.description:
Two bollards have been dislodged several months ago and are currently lying on the grass verge. This was reported previously and only one of the three were fixed, despite being 5 doors down from the other two that are still out of place.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oakwood Avenue, Southgate
Report on FixMyStreet
